entry.def: A Caucasian person is a white person.

entry.tran: 高加索人的，白种人的(人类学上指属于欧洲、北非及西亚的人种)
entry.def: Anthropologists use Caucasian to refer to someone from a racial grouping coming from Europe, North Africa, and western Asia.

example.tran: 蓝眼睛和白种人的面庞

means.word_mean: 1. of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration;
